name: Visitors Daily PHP Counter
short_description:
I have created this script for my own website, but I have also decided to share this script with public.. So if anyone will find any kind of bug or error , plz give a feedback...


DEMO: http://www.palpitate.org/demos/php/counter/


In order to use this script, you will need a web host that supports MySQL and PHP.
This Counter shows your daily hits and total hits. Every day the counter starts again.
